snippet: Three Lebanese soldiers were ambushed as they pursued a wanted man, playing into fears that an influx of refugees could spread the Syrian conflict into Lebanon.
abstract: Three Lebanese Army soldiers are killed in shootout as they try to arrest resident of village that has become hub of refugees and where Syrian rebels often cross border.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and Jodi Rudoren from Jerusalem. Reporting was contributed by Irit Pazner Garshowitz from Jerusalem, Ellen Barry from Moscow, Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: Three Lebanese soldiers were ambushed as they pursued a wanted man, playing into fears that an influx of refugees could spread the Syrian conflict into Lebanon.

headline.seo: Deadly Firefight on Lebanon’s Border With Syria
headline.main: Soldiers in Lebanon Die in Raid Near Syria
headline.print_headline: Soldiers In Lebanon Die in Raid Near Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
